summary.span: Define o contrato entre o Visual Studio 2010 e o Designer de Fluxo de Trabalho do Windows para ajuda integrada fornecida.

span.span: Defines the contract between Visual Studio 2010 and the Windows Workflow Designer for integrated help provided.
